Literature.Title: Modification and Synergistic Studies of a Novel Frog Antimicrobial Peptide against Pseudomonas aeruginosa Biofilms.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MBC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MBC=32µM),Enterococcus faecalis NCTC 12697(MIC=64µM),Enterococcus faecalis NCTC 12697(MBC=256µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=16µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MBC=16µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 43816(MIC=32µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 43816(MBC=64µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=64µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MBC=64µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC BAA-747(MIC=32µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC BAA-747(MBC=64µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=32µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MBC=32µM)
